name: Dr. Alistair Harding
occupation: Chief Physician at St. Mary's Hospital
traits: Exhausted eyes, stained coat, perpetually smells of antiseptic and stale coffee.
motivation: To save lives, but he is overwhelmed by the sheer volume of sickness and strange injuries in Arkham.
secret: He has a private laudanum addiction to cope with the stress and the things he has seen in the operating theater that defy medical science.
hook: The investigators are visiting a victim at the hospital or need a medical opinion on a strange corpse.
